committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: To provide for construction and lease-purchase acquisition, on government-owned land, of a building to provide housing for the Environmental Protection Agency in the Research Triangle Park, North Carolina, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of General Services to construct on Federal land on the South Campus of the Research Triangle Park, North Carolina, a building to house the Environmental Protection Agency and a parking facility for occupants and visitors. Provides that construction of such building and facility shall be carried out through a lease-purchase arrangement containing certain terms. Authorizes appropriations for design and site testing for the building.

titles.title: To provide for construction and lease-purchase acquisition, on government-owned land, of a building to provide housing for the Environmental Protection Agency in the Research Triangle Park, North Carolina, and for other purposes.
